long_description: Built to handle everything from cold snaps to spring sessions, the classic Burton Breach insulated jacket protects against harsh mountain conditions and also goes well with anything in your closet. DRYRIDE Durashell(TM) 2-layer coated nylon shell with critically taped seams provides windproof, waterproof and breathable protection from the elements. 60g 3M(TM) Thinsulate insulation in the body and 40g in the sleeves and hood is placed strategically to retain warmth and keep you comfortable on cold days. Contoured hood is designed to fit the shape of your head, providing all-weather defense without impairing vision or limiting mobility. Removable waist gaiter with jacket-to-pants interface creates a barrier against snow entry with compatible Burton pants (sold separately). Includes hand pockets, two water-resistant chest pockets, internal stash pocket and an internal goggles pocket with a media sleeve. Breach jacket has the Burton Mid Fit, which is slightly longer and more tailored than the classic Sig Fit, but roomier than the Slim Fit; looks good on snow and the street.
